pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 40  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)adult: 3-5 on easy, 3-8 on normal, 4.5-12 on hard $(br)baby: 0.5, 0.75 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() When a $(l:creatures/animal-hoglin)$(thing)Hoglin$() left the $(l:world/dimensions#nether)Nether$()  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)They are healed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_damage)$(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_health)$(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(l:brewing/effects#regeneration)$(thing)Regeneration$() and $(l:brewing/effects#poison)$(thing)Poison effects$().
